text: but :+1: is literally `:+1:`, so that implies that you agree with whatever your emoji-ing on, no? :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: , so that implies that you agree with whatever your emoji-ing on, no?

text:
It's only +1 in the context of Slack and some other places that use those replacements. Slack has a habit of attaching their own meanings to emoji (for an example see their explanations for the "getting work done" emoji).

The way I read it is just based on how people use it most in my experience, which is most likely different for other people :shrug:

text: What's the "getting work done" emoji? Asking for a friend...
